channel.title: How do I make custom NPCs?
channel.description:
No, I don't mean how do I spawn NPCs. I mean, how can I configure an NPC's appearance like I can a regular player. Also I need to know how to give them things like different weapons and armor.
I think I saw how in the no-dummies client (The one that renamed most of the garbage, awesome btw) because in the player.java (client side) there was a lot of stuff dealing with equips. The NPC.java (client side) was a lot smaller and did not contain any of that. Unfortunately, I know that I will guarantee a screw-up if I try to amend any of these codes, so if anyone can help I would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: How do I make custom NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

No, I don’t mean how do I spawn NPCs. I mean, how can I configure an NPC’s appearance like I can a regular player. Also I need to know how to give them things like different weapons and armor.

I think I saw how in the no-dummies client (The one that renamed most of the garbage, awesome btw) because in the player.java (client side) there was a lot of stuff dealing with equips. The NPC.java (client side) was a lot smaller and did not contain any of that. Unfortunately, I know that I will guarantee a screw-up if I try to amend any of these codes, so if anyone can help I would greatly appreciate it.
